summary: This is one of my characters made into a follower
descriptionHtml:
This is miss blue , she was my first main character i had on PC and I wanted to turn her into a follower so i could still have her on my game with other characters I make in the future. 

She should be found in dragonreach , and comes equipped with cassandra frost witch armor she uses ice spells and has a custom butterfly healing spell. 

she uses a UUNP body and armor 

Huge thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/29658810]wnisewond[/url] for his "all my work in one file" presets mod for being her base start. If you struggle with characters please check him out!! 

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88709


Huge thanks to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738]Ashes2Asherz[/url]  for basically throwing her together , adding her custom armor and adding her spells including the butterfly healing one. Im still new and learning and he did most of the work ( ok all lol ) on putting her together for me. Thank you again. 

In my game she has tattoos and Im still working on that version and will update this once thats done to add both versions of her but for now Im puttin this one up ( no tattoo's) , shes in my game and been working well but any feedback is greatly appreciated and welcome. 

credit to wnisewond for her preset 
base credit to asherz for putting her together
 credit to nerune2525 mikan eyes for her eyes
 credit to Kalilies ks hair renewal for her hair
 credit to lthot brows for her brows
 credit to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url] cassandra frost witch armor
author: Panda  Ashes2Asherz
